Package om

These packages contain the Om (OpenMark-S) system implementation.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
PreProcessingRequestHandler Template contract for things that need to be handled before the rest of the processing takes place.
RequestHandler For each request a new implementation of this contract is created.
RequestManagement  
RequestResponse Simply interface for the RequestHandler contract.
 

Class Summary
AbstractDatabaseSpecificOpenMarkServlet Servlets (webapps) that require access to the OpenMark database should extend this implementation as it provides everything setup for the RequestAssociates and tidies itself on shutdown.
AbstractOpenMarkServlet This abstractions provides for setup of using request delegation through to independent RequestHandlers based on the implementing supplied configuration.
AbstractRequestHandler  
DisplayUtils TODO : this mixes the presentation logic with the business logic.
Log Facility for creating log files.
Log.LogFile Data about a single log file.
OmVersion Static class that only provides information about the build version
RenderedOutput A simplified POJO that holds details to report to the user as to the progress of the deployment of the Questions to the configured locations.
RequestAssociates Provides a visitor based pattern of things that may be needed by the request.
RequestDelegation A means of handling a users request through the configuration of different request handlers for the url path.
RequestHandlerSettings Holds reference to the configuration specified in the requestHandlers.xml Each Element is parsed and turned into an instance of this class for easier interogation at runtime.
RequestHandlingConfiguration From the provided requestHandlers.xml configuration File this class interprets it and then holds reference to the settings within the composite configurationSettings collection so that these can be examined at runtime.
ShutdownManager Allows classes to be notified when the webapp is shut down so that they can null any relevant static member fields that might be keeping things from being properly GCed.
 

Enum Summary
RequestHandlerEnums  
RequestParameterNames  
 

Exception Summary
OmDeveloperException For throwing when an exception occurs due to a development error by a question developer.
OmException Standard exception superclass
OmFormatException Thrown when there is a problem with the format of an Om XML file.
OmRemoteException For throwing when an exception occurs due to a faiure to connect to a remote service.
OmTodoException Class used for parts of code that aren't implemented
OmTransientQuestionException Exceptions from the qestion that are transient in nature,
OmUnexpectedException For throwing when an exception occurs that was not expected by the developer.
OpenmarkException  
PersistenceException  
RequestHandlingException  
 

Package om Description

These packages contain the Om (OpenMark-S) system implementation. They have dependencies on some classes from the util package, but that's pretty much it.
